Projects

Hearby.com

A live music app built with the team at Area4Labs . See resume for details.

Time Blocker

An interative time blocking application. Utilizes the React's native state management hook useReducer. Uses Auth0 for authorization and Firebase for data storage.

Comfy Sloth

A React storefront with Stripe payments and Auth0 authentication. Product data is provided by a public API. I converted this project to from useReducer to Redux to explore their differences.

Chat App

Realtime chat application powered by Socket.io with Node / Express, and PostgreSQL backend. React / Redux frontend. As an interview assessment for Hatchways, I implemented a message-read status and cookie based JWT authentication, as well as a complete redesign of the login / register page. Socket security and efficiency was also improved.

Shopify Storefront

A headless React ecommerce site using the Shopify API. Styled with Chakra UI.
